explains: adj. 日常的，工作日的；平凡的

sentences.en: When he left the office, that was it, the workday was over.
sentences.cn: 他一离开办公室，工作日就这样结束了。

sentences.en: This hands-on management approach often stretches his workday from 6 a.m. to 11 p.m.
sentences.cn: 这种事必躬亲的管理方法常常使他在工作日从早晨6:00一直工作到晚上11:00。

sentences.en: The length of the workday, for many workers, is defined by time.
sentences.cn: 对于许多工人来说，工作日的长度是由时间来定义的。
